Posts.Content: If it makes you feel not so alone, my mama is slowly dying too...but not from cancer but she's getting there too, but, it's from the vaginal mesh, it makes me so scared that i can't do anything except watch it slowly eat away at her, and i no this is off topic but, i dont know who else to talk to about this and i'm very scared...its slowly taking my mama away from me...and as she is slowly dying, i feel horrible just sitting there...but, what is there to do? I hope your mama makes it alright and my best of wishes to ya sooo, yeah, thx for lending an ear
Posts.Title: i am so Scared For my Mom!!!
